verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H2930>them,<s%> 'A priest shall not defile himself for the <S%H5315>dead<s%> among his <S%H5971>people;<s%>

except for his <S%H7607>relatives<s%> that are <S%H7138>near<s%> to <S%H517>him:<s%> for his mother, for his <S%H1>father,<s%> for his <S%H1121>son,<s%> for his <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> for his <S%H251>brother,<s%>
and for his <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%> who is <S%H7138>near<s%> to <S%H376>him,<s%> who has had no husband; for her he may defile <S%H2930>himself.<s%>
He shall not <S%H2930>defile<s%> <S%H1167>himself,<s%> being a chief man among his <S%H5971>people,<s%> to profane <S%H2490>himself.<s%>

<S%H7144><s%>"'They shall not shave <S%H7139>their<s%> <S%H7218>heads,<s%> neither shall they shave <S%H1548>off<s%> the <S%H6285>corners<s%> of their <S%H2206>beards,<s%> nor <S%H8295>make<s%> any <S%H8296>cuttings<s%> in their <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

They shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> to their <S%H430>God,<s%> and not <S%H2490>profane<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of their <S%H430>God;<s%> for they <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of their <S%H430>God;<s%> therefore they shall be <S%H6918>holy.<s%>

<S%H3947><s%>"'They shall not marry a <S%H802>woman<s%> who is a <S%H2181>prostitute,<s%> or <S%H2491>profane;<s%> neither shall they <S%H3947>marry<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H1644>divorced<s%> from her <S%H376>husband:<s%> for he is <S%H6918>holy<s%> to his <S%H430>God.<s%>

You shall <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> him <S%H7126>therefore;<s%> for he offers the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of your <S%H430>God:<s%> he shall be <S%H6918>holy<s%> to <S%H3068>you:<s%> for I Yahweh, who <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H6918>you,<s%> am holy.

<S%H1323><s%>"'The daughter of <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> if she <S%H2490>profanes<s%> herself by playing the <S%H2181>prostitute,<s%> she <S%H2490>profanes<s%> her <S%H1>father:<s%> she shall be <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

<S%H1419><s%>"'He who is the high <S%H3548>priest<s%> among his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> upon whose <S%H7218>head<s%> the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> is <S%H3332>poured,<s%> and that is <S%H4390>consecrated<s%> to <S%H3847>put<s%> on the <S%H899>garments,<s%> shall not let the hair of his <S%H7218>head<s%> hang <S%H6544>loose,<s%> nor <S%H6533>tear<s%> his <S%H899>clothes;<s%>
neither shall he go <S%H935>in<s%> to any <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H5315>body,<s%> nor <S%H2930>defile<s%> himself for his <S%H1>father,<s%> or for his <S%H517>mother;<s%>

neither shall he go <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> nor <S%H2490>profane<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of his <S%H430>God;<s%> for the <S%H5145>crown<s%> of the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> of his <S%H430>God<s%> is upon <S%H3068>him.<s%> I am Yahweh.
<S%H3947><s%>"'He shall take a <S%H802>wife<s%> in her <S%H1331>virginity.<s%>

A <S%H490>widow,<s%> or one <S%H1644>divorced,<s%> or a woman who has been <S%H2181>defiled,<s%> or a prostitute, these he shall not <S%H1330>marry:<s%> but a virgin of his own <S%H5971>people<s%> shall he take as a <S%H802>wife.<s%>
He shall not <S%H2490>profane<s%> his <S%H2233>seed<s%> among his <S%H5971>people:<s%> for I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> who sanctifies <S%H6942>him.<s%>'"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Say<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H376><s%> 'None of your <S%H2233>seed<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations<s%> who has a <S%H3971>blemish,<s%> may <S%H7126>approach<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of his <S%H430>God.<s%>

For whatever <S%H376>man<s%> he is that has a <S%H3971>blemish,<s%> he shall not <S%H7126>draw<s%> <S%H5787>near:<s%> a blind <S%H376>man,<s%> or a <S%H6455>lame,<s%> or he who has a flat <S%H2763>nose,<s%> or any <S%H8311>deformity,<s%>
or a <S%H376>man<s%> who has an injured <S%H7667>foot,<s%> or an injured <S%H7667>hand,<s%>

or <S%H1384>hunchbacked,<s%> or a <S%H1851>dwarf,<s%> or one who has a <S%H8400>defect<s%> in his <S%H5869>eye,<s%> or an itching <S%H1618>disease,<s%> or <S%H3217>scabs,<s%> or who has <S%H4790>damaged<s%> <S%H810>testicles;<s%>

no <S%H376>man<s%> of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> who has a <S%H3971>blemish,<s%> shall come <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> made by <S%H801>fire.<s%> Since he has a <S%H3971>blemish,<s%> he shall not come <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of his <S%H430>God.<s%>
He shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of his <S%H430>God,<s%> both of the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy,<s%> and of the <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

He shall not come <S%H935>near<s%> to the <S%H6532>veil,<s%> nor come <S%H5066>near<s%> to the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> because he has a <S%H3971>blemish;<s%> that he may not <S%H2490>profane<s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuaries,<s%> for I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> who sanctifies <S%H6942>them.<s%>'"
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and to all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
